channel.title: Overview :: Go Kure
channel.description: Overview Kure is a Go library and CLI toolset for programmatic Kubernetes resource generation, designed for GitOps workflows with Flux and ArgoCD. Explore the Project README for a comprehensive introduction.

item.title: Project README
item.description: Kure Kure is a Go library for programmatically building Kubernetes resources used by GitOps tools like Flux, cert-manager, MetalLB, and External Secrets. The library emphasizes strongly-typed object construction over templating engines, providing a clean, type-safe approach to Kubernetes manifest generation.
